backend/main.mo: Defines auction actor with players, bidders, audience limits, and logic for joining/leaving audience and starting auctions.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration initializing audience-related fields for the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking audience-limit features to corresponding frontend files and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High-level summaries of all major frontend files including new audience-limit features.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router switching between setup, auction, results, and audience screens.
frontend/src/components/auction/AuctionS: UI for running the auction with bidding, selling players, and viewing current state.
frontend/src/components/auction/Audience: Read‑only live auction viewer that auto‑joins/leaves audience and shows capacity and auction data.
frontend/src/components/auction/guards.t: Implements validation for setup fields and bid submissions, enforcing required formats and constraints.
frontend/src/components/auction/ResultsS: Displays final auction results, including bidder rosters, spending summaries, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/auction/SetupScr: Provides a form to configure bidders, players, and secret key, then triggers auction initialization.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuctionQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching auction state and performing actions like starting auctions, bidding, and audience management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth flow, storing identity state and exposing login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Provides functions to normalize and clean backend error messages into readable user-facing strings.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Contains formatting helpers for rupee amounts, player status, and highest bidder text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, implemented features, pending requests, and overall project state.
